attributes.action: REPLACE A DEFENCE MINISTER CLEARLY OUT OF HIS DEPTH
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: sack robert ainsworth due to incompetance.

rejection.details: Please address the excessive use of capital letters; they make your petition hard to read. It is also unclear from your current petition how this relates to government policy.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
